galaxy_setting.name: EnclaveMaxHopsFromHiveToAttack
galaxy_setting.display_name: Global Max Hops from Hives to Attack
galaxy_setting.description: How far away can non-defensive Enclaves attack from planets with friendly Hives?

galaxy_setting.name: MakeEveryXFireteamDefensive
galaxy_setting.display_name: Global Make Every X Fireteam Defensive
galaxy_setting.description: Defensive Enclaves put a much higher priority on defending Hives. You can modify this to change their overall aggression. Can be set to 0 to disable defensive Enclaves entirely.

galaxy_setting.name: RetreatAtXHull
galaxy_setting.description: The percentage of hull at which point Enclaves will retreat to a Hive planet for repairs. Disabled when set to 0.

galaxy_setting.name: MaxDefensiveEnclave
galaxy_setting.description: The maximum amount of Defensive Enclave that an Enclave subfaction can have. Set to -1 for unlimited, and 0 to disable Defensive Enclaves all together.

galaxy_setting.name: PearlEnclaveEnabled
galaxy_setting.description: Enables the Pearl Enclave, which is allied to the player. This cannot be disabled after the game starts.

galaxy_setting.name: PearlEnclaveSettingsEnabled
galaxy_setting.description: Enable custom settings for the Pearl Enclave. If disabled, will default to the global settings at the top of this menu.
